column1:
ざんねん！……
あなたは、”ぜつめつ”してしまいました。

…………………。
わたしのちち”たいよう”には
　　　　　　　　ナイショですが……
よみがえらせてあげましょう！
でも、ｅｖｏ．ｐは　すこし
へってしまいます……。
column3:
I will revive you.
Please keep this a 
secret from my father,
the Sun.
Your EVO.P has been
reduced slightly.
column5:
How ter[ri]b[le]! You['v]e
become ex[ti]nct!




…

My fa[the]r [the] Sun
abso[lu]te[ly] must not
[le]arn of [thi]s…

But, I w[ill] send you
back!


However, your EP
w[ill] be reduced a [li][tt][le]…
column7:
Oh no! You['v]e gone
ex[ti]nct!

>s[ig]h< …


We[ll]… I guess, as [lo]ng
as my fa[the]r never ever
[fi]nds out…



I['ll] just rev[iv]e you![#10]





But… I['ll] have to reduce
your EP a [li][tt][le]. Sorry!

column1:
おどろかせて、ごめんなさい…。

わたしの名は　”ガイア”
すべての”いのち”を　みまもり、あなたと
ともに、いきてゆくもの……。
これから、あなたは　時をちょうえつした
５億年ものながい”進化のたび”を
たいけんすることになるでしょう。
それは、よわねをはいたら　いきていけない
つよいもののみが　いきのこれる
”じゃくにく　きょうしょく”のせかい…。
けっして、”ぜつめつ”しないように、
いきぬいていってください。
なぜなら……
”進化のたび”の　ゴールである
”エデンのち”で、かならず　あなたに
あいたいからです……。

　　　　　　　がんばって！
column3:
I am sorry. I did
not mean to surprise
you.
My name is Gaia.
I am the one who
watches over all
life, including you.


You will journey
through many periods
of time on this
planet. A journey of 
change.

This is a world where
only the strong may 
survive. The laws are
governed by those of
the jungle.

Please try to survive!
I would like to see
you in a place called 

"Eden".


This is your goal.


Please, do your best!

column1:
…………………………！？

からだのなかから、なにかが
かたりかけてくる！！

「進化は　じゅんちょうかい？
　しんぱいしないで！　ぼくは　きみの
　進化の　てだすけをするものだよ。
　”クリスタル”とでも　よんでおくれ。
　きみに進化のアドバイスをしてあげよう。

　アゴの進化は、かみつくカ
　どうたいの進化は、ぼうぎょカ
　ツノの進化は、ツノのこうげきカ
　て、あし、せびれ、おっぽの進化は、
　体カ、体あたりのカ、いどうスピードに
　えいきょうするんだ。
　でも、進化したために、
　べつの　のうりょくが　おとろえてしまう
　ことがあるので、ちゅういしてね！」
column3:
How are you
progressing?
Don't worry I will
help you evolve.
You may call me 
crystal.
I will give you advice
on how to evolve.

Evolving your jaws 
will increase your
biting strength.
Evolving your body
will increase your
defensive power.
Evolving your horns
will increase your
attack power.
Evolving your hands,
feet and dorsal fin
as well as your tail,
will increase your
Hit Point level,
agility and strength.
Be careful, evolving
one part of your body
may decrease another
part.
column5:
…[?!]

Some[thi]ng starts t[al]k[in]g
[in][si]de your body[!!]


“Ev[ol]u[ti]on go[in]g okay?
 Don['t] worry! I'm here
 to h[el]p you out!
 You can ca[ll] me
‘Cryst[al][.’] I['ll] g[iv]e you
 some ev[ol]u[ti]on ad[vi]ce!
 Ev[ol]v[in]g your jaw ra[is]es
 your b[it]e power.
 Ev[ol]v[in]g your body
 ra[is]es your defense.
 Ev[ol]v[in]g a horn ra[is]es
 your horn a[tt]ack.
 Ev[ol]v[in]g your hands,
 feet, [fi]n, and ta[il] w[ill]
 [in]f[lu]ence your HP, body
 s[la]m a[tt]ack, and
 movement speed.

 But some[ti]mes, ev[ol]v[in]g
 m[ig]ht weaken o[the]r
 ab[il][it][ie]s.

 So take care[!”]

column1:
あなたのことを　ウワサしているこえが
きこえてくる。　しかし、だれが
しゃべっているのかは　わからない……。
「おや？　このげんしてきな　せいぶつは
　ほかの　せいぶつとは　すこしようすが
　ちがっているようだな……。」
「もしかしたら、
　すばらしい　進化を　とげるかも
　しれないなあ……。」

speaking but you
do not know from
where.


"Hmm, this small fish
looks different from
the others...."
"This creature may
evolve wonderfully."

column1:
ナマコたちの　うわさばなしがきこえる。
「アンコウのつの　って　そのひかりで
　テキを　ひきつけるんだって！スゴイ！」
「それはそうと、３つめの　かざんのうみを
　こえると　もう　このうみに　もどれなく
　なるらしいよ。なんでも…
　あたらしいせかいに、さかなをみちびく
　ための、ガイアさまの
　けいかくらしいんだって！」
「ふーん……。あたらしいせかい　かあ。
　ぼくらは、このうみで　まんぞくさ！
　ナマ、ナマーーッ！！」
column3:
Rumors circulate 
among the cucumbers.

"The Angler's horn
attracts enemies
because of it's great
light!"
"They say we can't 
return here if we
cross the third 
volcano in the sea.

It is Gaia's plan to
lead the fish to a 
new world."

"Hmm... A new world."

You hear [the] sea
cucumbers gos[si]p[in]g.




“So, [tha]t Ang[le]r['s] Horn?
 That a[tt]racts enem[ie]s

 Amaaaz[in]g[!!]”

 f[is]h to a new wor[ld][.”]



“Hmm… A new wor[ld], huh?
 For us, [the] sea [is]

“Did you know? If you

 Wor[ld][.’]”


“Bah! ‘New Wor[ld][?’] T[hi]s

ストロマトライトたちの

“If only we could move around freely, without clinging to things like the seabed, we would live without being ruled by those rough Cladoselaches.”
“Shh! The cave boss will hear you!”

column1:
ん？　　なにものだ！？

ここが、
”うみのおうじゃ”　クラドセラケさまの
なわばりとしって、はいってきたのかっ！？
きさま、もしかしてあのストロマトやろうの
”あたらしいせかい”づくりを　てつだう
つもりじゃねーだろうなっ！
せかいは、この”うみ”だけで
じゅうぶんだっ！　やつらにカをかす
やろうは、このオレが　ゆるさねえっ！！
column3:
Huh? Who are you?

domain of the 
Kuraselache, King of
the Sea, why are you
here?
Are you not trying
to help the Strolites
build a new world?



I will defeat anyone
who helps the 
Strolites!

Huh? What['s] [thi]s?

st[ill] barge [in][?!]

You moron! You can['t] be
[thi]nk[in]g of h[el]p[in]g [tho]se
Stromato-nuts w[it]h [the]ir
“new wor[ld]” p[la]n!

wor[ld] we need!
If you['r]e here to h[el]p

[le]t you [le]ave here a[li]ve[!!]
column7:

I'm [the] top C[la]dos[el]ache!

And you['r]e bu[tt][in]g [in] on

be h[el]p[in]g [tho]se
Stromato-nuts w[it]h
[the]ir “New Wor[ld]” p[la]n.

column8: “This me won't forgive any doofus who helps those doofuses”

column1:
ぼくらは、ストロマトライト。
うみのそとは、ぼくらのつくった”サンソ”
にみたされ、
いま、”あたらしいせかい”として、
うまれかわりました。
いりぐちは、すぐそこですよ。

We are the Strolites.
Outside the sea a 
world filled with
oxygen is being born.
The entrance is here.
column5:
We['r]e [the] Stromato[li]tes.
Out[si]de [the] sea, [the]
“oxygen” we['v]e made [is]

And now, [tha]t wor[ld][--][the]
New Wor[ld][--]has been

r[ig]ht above you!
column7:
Hey, [it]['s] us, [the]
Stromat[ol][it]es!

Beyond [the] sea, [the] [ai]r
[is] f[ill][in]g up w[it]h [the]
oxygen we made.
It['s] a “New Wor[ld][,”] w[it]h

up [the]re!

column1:
さあ、おゆきなさい！
”あたらしいせかい”がまってますよ！
column3:
Okay, let's go.
A "New World" awaits

column5:
We[ll], go on! The New
Wor[ld] [is] wa[it][in]g!

column1:
ガイアです。
２億年もつづいた”魚の時代”は、おわり
これから、”サンソ”にみたされた
”りくの時代”がはじまろうとしています。
ストロマトライトのなかま、”しょくぶつ”
たちが、ひとあしさきに　じょうりくして
これから　やってくる　いきものたちが
すみやすくなるように、いっしょうけんめい
じゅんびをしています。
さて！
魚の時代を　みごといきぬいた　あなたには
すばらしい　プレゼントがありますよ！
それは”両せい類のからだ”です。
さんそを　こきゅうできる”はい”をもち
ちじょうを　じゆうにうごけるものです。
そのからだで、あたらしい　ぼうけんを
はじめなさい！
　　　　　　それでは………
おおいなるカよ！
このものに、あたらしいからだを
あたえたまえ！
column3:
I am Gaia.
The "Fish Age" lasted
about 2 billion
years. As it ended it
gave way to the 
beginning of a new 
world. One filled 
with oxygen. It is
called the "Land Age".
The Strolites and
plants have already 
begun living here to
prepare a better 
place for those who
choose to follow.
Here is a present for
survivng the Fish Age.
It is the body of an
Amphibian. You have
lungs so that you may
breathe and you may 
also move about the
ground freely.

A new adventure 
awaits your new body.
So----.
Great Power-.
Please give this 
creature a new body.
column5:
Th[is] [is] Ga[ia].

A[ft]er 200 m[il][li]on years,
[it] [is] [the] end of [the] Age
of F[is]h.

Now, we beg[in] [the]
oxygen-r[ic]h Age of
Land.



The “p[la]nts” who h[el]ped
[the] Stromato[li]tes have
gone ahead of you.
They are work[in]g hard
now, so [tha]t [la]ter l[if]e
can f[lo]ur[is]h.
Now, [the]n!
I have a wonderf[ul] g[if]t
for you, now [tha]t you
have surv[iv]ed [the] Age of
F[is]h…
An amp[hi]b[ia]n body!
It can brea[the] oxygen
w[it]h [it]s [lu]ngs and move
free[ly] on [la]nd.
P[le]ase use [it] [in] your new
adventure!
       So…
Alm[ig]hty Power!
Grant [thi]s creature a
new body!
column7:
It['s] Ga[ia]!





The F[is]h Age,w[hi]ch [la]sted
for 200 m[il][li]on years, [is]
end[in]g. The oxygen-r[ic]h
Land Age [is] about to
beg[in].

I [thi]nk you [al]ready met
some fr[ie]nds of [the]
Stromat[ol][it]es, r[ig]ht?
They['r]e c[al][le]d “p[la]nts[!”]


They['ll] soon popu[la]te [the]
[la]nd, and [the]n [the]y['ll]
work very hard to get
every[thi]ng ready for
[the] a[ni]m[al]s who f[ol][lo]w.

Anyway![#10]

S[in]ce you did so we[ll]
surv[iv][in]g [the] F[is]h Age,
I have a n[ic]e g[if]t for
you.
It['s] an “amp[hi]b[ia]n” body!
It has “[lu]ngs” [tha]t can
brea[the] oxygen, so you
can trav[el] on [la]nd
free[ly].

W[it]h [tha]t body, you can
start a wh[ol]e new
adventure!



So, here we go!

Almighty Power[!!] [#10]

Bestow upon [thi]s
creature a new body!

column1:
Ich[thy]ostega e[ld]er:
“Impress[iv]e[!”]

Ich[thy]ostega c[hi][ld]:

Ich[thy]ostega e[ld]er:

  Yes

Ich[thy]ostega c[hi][ld]:
“But we need you!
 L[is]ten to Grampa['s]

“Oh, good! You see,

 But some [str]ange[ly]-

column3:
Elder of Ikustega:
"You are great!"

Child of Ikustega:
"You are strong!"
Elder of Ikustega:
"Considering your
great strength, I have
something to ask you.
Could you do me a
favor?"

Yes
No
Child of Ikustega:
"Please, please 
listen to Granpa's 
story!"


"Thank you. Actually,
this land used to be 
covered with plants.
Suddenly, insects 
started to evolve
extremely abnormally.
These insects ate all
of the plant life 
leaving this place
like a desert.
They are trying to
eat any remaining 
plants around the
area.
They refused our 
proposal to 
coexist. Now they
are attacking our
people.
The father of this
child went to try and
persuade them, but he
has never returned."


Child of Ikustega:
"---- Dad ----."
Elder of Ikustega:
"Could you please
help us?"

son.

column8:
“I planned to persuade the King Bee, but now I'm in this mess.

Can't someone explain the importance of coexistence to that guy?

You strong-looking person there... I have a favor to ask. I'll die soon.

When I die, eat the meat I gathered! Then, defeat that darn Bee King!

If you can defeat that guy, it should restore the greenery to this continent. But...

I wanted to at least see my son before I die...

My son... Goodbye...”

You hear someone

Whisper A:

good for the future of
this planet------"
